data.message: I can't access my account cause the mobile service provider of my number registered in my account is no longer recognizes this number as valid. Can you make another update to Facebook which we can receive log in approval codes in emails and not just on code generator and sms. I swear it will be a big help for your users. Thanks!

replies.message: Hey there, Abby. If you're being asked to enter a login code and you can’t access your phone, there are a few things you can try. Learn more: http://bit.ly/295IgRm. Thanks. -Jordan
Hi! I got an email from your team. My problem is solve. Thanks!

Facebook can you please help?  Or can you give me a good contact email for them Abby?  My husband deactivated his account in 2012.  Well it is now active, so somebody has hacked into it.  Well, the email address associated with his fb was from 2005 and he now has a new one, so we can get a new password sent to him.  We just need his fb deactivated.  Please help!
